content.detailedDescription: As i arrived to my friend's house to drop her off, i stepped out of my car to let her out of the backseat. after starting to say goodbye, i looked up to the sky and noticed what were certainly not stars, nor common aircraft. i was amazed to see three, orangish-red, glowing triangles, flying in a triangular formation. their speed seemed to be comparable to that of typical jets, however, there was absolutely no sound to be heard from this spectacle. they were in the northwestern sky, flying from west to east. i observed this for about two minutes, when then the light emitted from each source seemed to flicker slightly, then fade out - the front one first, then another, then the last one, until i saw them no more. i was incredibly excited and overwhelmed with curiosity after viewing this incredible and unexplainable sight.
content.summary: 3 bright orange triangles slowly moved across the sky in a triangle formation, then the light emitting from each slowly flickered & faded, one by one.

content.detailedDescription:
Just after 10pm last evening, i looked out my front door to see if my son's car was in the driveway. i immediately noticed a glowing mass coming into view over the roofline of my neighbor's house. i initially thought it may have been a fireworks burst, but instead of dissipating, it continued rise out of the southeast glowing orange-gold.

at first sight, the object appeared to be about as large as an aspirin tablet held at arm's length. it limbed slowly, taking up a general southerly direction, and three times rained down orange-gold sparks, almost as if melting

the object was very large and very bright. suddenly, the thing grew dim, went dark, appeared to hover, then blinked off and on and off a couple of times before it disappeared from sight. i'm not sure what it was, but it clearly wasn't an aircraft, balloon, or a celestial object!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Brightly glowing mass rose in se and climed into night sky, occasionally 'dripping' sparks as it rose.

content.detailedDescription:
I  was sleeping, woke up at around three am ..  i saw some real bright lights they were looking at me all i could think was how could a ufo be so smalli  really rhought it was cool but did not move or budge.. i dont remember when it left or what else happened.
the object was ovalish the size of a ten gallon aquarium..   still in motion.
content.summary: I  was  in my bedroom it was besides  my  bed. small, many lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my room studying for an upcoming exam. out of the window, i spotted a very bright white light, fairly close to the horizon. at first i dismissed it as some conventional aircraft (most likely a plane) but after a few separate glances i thought it wasn't moving at all. just hovering, but far too bright to be a star (especially since i live in the middle of a city). due to recent sightings i'd had from my bedroom window before, i decided to film the light for a while to see if i could capture any abnormalities, thinking to myself if there was nothing i would delete the video and never tell anyone i was silly enough to record it.

as i started recording, the object began to move ever so slowly to the east. it maintained a fairly constant speed and barely even seemed to be moving. i started to think i was just seeing a plane at an odd angle and it was nothing. just before i shut off the recording function on my phone, a second light appeared right next to the first. it was identical in shape, size and color. the first continued to move to the east, and as i review the tape i realize it did slowly gain speed. the second object moved at a slower pace, but headed in the same general direction as the first.

i followed their continual movement as it moved south-east of the starting position. eventually i could no longer see them from the window with the camera or my naked eye. i was shocked and somewhat frightened by the experience, and immediately went to show my mother the video. i was also very excited to catch something so odd on video, and have since been unable to explain the sudden appearance of the second object from no where.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovering bright white light joined by identical light which appeared from no where

content.detailedDescription: It was about 8:45/8:50 pm on friday, september 13th 2013 i was busy on my computer when my grandmother called me into her bedroom to look at something outside. i went into her room and looked out the window and saw three orange lights. one looked almost flame like while the other two looked more like actual lights. i stared at the flame like one thinking it must be a meteor, but i've seen a meteor before and the more i looked at it the more i knew that it wasn't one. my grandmother said when she first saw it she thought it was a firework because it started out as a pinwheel shape and spread out, but there was no fireworks. once i got into her room to see them they were moving straight and in more a triangular shape, these lights were pretty low, pulsating, moving very slowly and in a straight path. some would disappear and reappear. so after watching from the window for a minuet i ran out into the living room to grab my cell phone and ran outside. in that 20 seconds it took me to get outside the three lights next to our house had disappeared and they either appeared across the street or new ones formed. again there were three distinctive pulsating lights, none of them were flame like this time they were all bright orange lights. they again were moving very slowly and steady, some other orange lights would appear and disappear but these three stayed put. at times it appeared as if they were hovering and then they would slowly start moving again. after a minuet most of the lights disappeared except for two. they were heading in the same direction in unison. then the one on the "top" started to slowly make it's way toward the light on the bottom. once they got close to each other the lights disappeared into thin air and never appeared again....As i witnessed this i pulled out my cellphone and started recording. i have a 22 second video showing the two lights. the whole encounter lasted a good 3 to 4 mins i would say. i have lived in this neighborhood for over 20yrs and i have never seen anything like this before. i was completely mystified, my sister and i were looking at each other like did we really just see what we think we saw? we both watch a ton of alien and ufo shows but never in a million years did we ever think we would see something like that. i firmly believe we witnessed a ufo.
content.summary: Orange lights moving very slowly in the sky, sometimes hovering and then dissappeared all together

content.detailedDescription: 7 orbs in the sky in massive triangle. 3 stayed in formation while others began to move around. had no flashing lights like a plane. i never ever see helicopters in the area. closest air force base is 2 hours east of here. moved in ways a plane does not.
content.summary: 7 orange-reddish lights in the sky in a perfect triangle. then began to break formation except 3.

content.detailedDescription: A couple of friends saw them in the sky from the other side of town.  i then looked up and saw them also.  none of us could hear any sounds overhead even though is was a cool damp night where sounds travels easily long distances.
content.summary: Flying orbs sort of rose over horizon, and then all followed the same arched path, then at one point ascended straight up which eliminated them from potentially being helicopters.  they also seemed to look like flares being launched, but kelpt rising

content.detailedDescription: Black mass moving very rapidly to the northeast so lights no sounds very strange
content.summary: Black mass shot across sky

content.detailedDescription:
Sorry, i did not see a ufo but i did have a encounter, this is the only website i can find to post what happened.

i was sleeping in bed, woke up and felt something going up and down my spine and was told that he/she was finding information about me, said i could turn around and look at him but that i would be scared if i did, i said i did not want to look, i was only 19 at the time.  i do not drink, do drugs, so nothing like that.

has anything like every been reported? i've watched a lot of shows on tv but no one talks about something coming to them and doing that..

i've had a few other things happen but at a different location and i do not believe it to be the same being doing it.

i am really hoping for a response back.

kind regards
content.summary: Encounter

content.detailedDescription: At 6:53 p.M. 13 sept. 2013 i witnessed a silver cylindrical object fly from west to east north of my house on the north side of cannon falls.  this object appeared to be a jet at 3 to 4 thousand feet.  made no noise (calm evening).  looked closer for wings.  there were none.  no navigation lights.  stared at object for over 10 seconds as it rode as if on a rail through the atmosphere.
content.summary: West to east object, no sound, no wings, no navigational lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I went onto my deck to view a helicopter passing overhead. i was hoping for an apache out of fort carson, but it was just another blackhawk.

as it passed overhead,  noticed something to my sse that was reflecting sunlight. i assume it was a reflection because of the color. the sun was to the sw at about the same degree above the horizon as the object.

focusing on the object at the portion that was not obscured by the reflection, it appeared to be boxy. looking closer the box appeared to be a large rectangular structure on the northern end of the object. object was dull aluminum in color. i heard ho sound or could detect no motion. i fairness the blackhawk was still audible.

i made a snap decision to go for my binoculars. i was back in less than 15 seconds and the sky was empty.

i was extremely frustrated!! i ran around hoping that perhaps it had moved to some location still visible to me. no luck!

i'm at 9,200 feet. if it was a mile away, then perhaps it was the size of a c130. i have no clue what this thing was. i saw nothing resembling propulsion.

someday perhaps i'll see something and i can say 'oh that's what that was'. total mystery.
content.summary: Daylight reflected sunlight, rectangular structure with depth visible on 1 end

content.detailedDescription: See attached e-mail diagram of object along w facts & observations.
content.summary: Shiny black spiral/cone shaped object hovering in the the sky at dusk.

content.detailedDescription: About 10pm sunday evening september 8th my husband walked outside for some fresh air, looked up into the sky and i heard him say "am i seeing things?" i went outside as well and looked up and saw a perfect orange rectangle in the south sky. it was positioned as a door would be with the two long sides vertical and two shorter sides horizontal and never changed shape. it looked to be pretty high up in the sky and very large.  the orange color was bright and would flicker slightly like a fire would. my husband and myself walked down the street southward toward an empty field across from our property along the horizon, directly above the tree line, was this bright orange glow that ran the length of the tree line which had to be at least a mile or two long. at first we thought that maybe it was a fire and a cloud was reflecting the fire but we saw no smoke, smelled no smoke, nor did we hear fire trucks. we live in the county and it's fairly quiet especially at 10pm at night. the orange rectangle stayed in the sky in the same place for about 20-30 minutes before fading until all we saw was one vertical black line.  i have looked online trying to find a reasonable explanation for this, was it a fire, explosion, something, anything, but have come up with nothing.  we also drove into the direction of where we saw this bright orange glow that appeared to be fire and have come up short there as well. no sign of fire anywhere nor was there a fire reported. while we were standing outside trying to figure out what this was our neighbor came home and we showed her what we were looking at and her 5 year old son said "oh that? i saw it all the way home." i tried to take a picture of it but it didn't show up on my camera.
content.summary: Large orange rectangle stationary in the sky that flittered like fire stayed for about 30 minutes then faded away. as well as an orange glow about a mile or so long above the tree line in the same direction as the orange rectangle.

content.detailedDescription:
The sky was in constant motion so i was taking pictures of the clouds rolling in.  there were spots of showers coming down in the distance and bolts of lightening and then to the east it was clear blue sky.  i was on my patio in my back yard under the patio roof.  i took 10 -15 pictures in about 15 - 20 minutes.  i was trying to catch a picture of the lightening so i was trying different settings on my camera.  when i started to rain i went in, and did not look at he pictures until the next day.  that was when i noticed the one picture with the space ship looking disc in the sky.  2 of them where identical and the third was like it was behind a cloud and was not as distinct and the other 2.  i thought how did i not see them when i took the picture yet they are plain as night and day in the picture.  everyone i have showed the picture to believes the same thing, that they were space ships from another planet.   my theory is they were not visible to the naked eye and for  some reason were picked up by the camera lens.
i am going to send you some of the other pictures i took too so you can see how amazing the sky looked that evening.
content.summary: Taking pictures of clouds rolling in, did not look at them till next day and showed up in one of the pictures

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from surprise, az heading west on bell near 185th st and witnessed multiple lights to the north west of us. two of the lights were really close to each other as if they were sitting on top of each other and the other lights were scattered about but still close to each other.  i mentioned it to my passenger who also noticed these red/orange lights and within 3 seconds they all disappeared at the same time. we noticed them around 9/11/13 8:30 pm but i am not sure how long they were there before that. i was driving so it was hard to tell but they did not appear to move.  they were nw of us towards the city of wickenburg. the whole event lasted 10 seconds or so.  i have never seen anything like and i have seen flares fall from the sky in the past.  very strange.
content.summary: Lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I work at a hospital as a custodian.  my shift ended at 12:30am on friday august 30th. 2013.  i was driving home.  i made a right turn off of west line street onto seevee lane headed north.  the light caught my attention because it was very bright, almost like a searchlight but it was not panning back and forth like a searchlight from a helicopter would do.  i slowed down so i could observe it while driving.  it was straight ahead of me on seevee lane about 1/2 a mile away, but i cannot be sure because it was dark and i have no way of comparing it to any landmarks.  it slowly moved to the east towards the white mountains.  i observed it for about 1 minute or less.  it gave me a strange feeling and i know it was not a conventional aircraft because there were no blinking lights and it seemed to move more slowly than even a helicopter.  i was going to wake my wife when i got home but by that time it was out of sight.  the most unusual thing about it was how bright it was, otherwise i would not even bother sharing this.  i would like to know if anyone else from my area saw this too.
thank you.
content.summary: Very bright white object slowly moving to the east.  not blinking and low in the sky.  much brighter than the street lights.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend witnessed a ufo flying first hand and took a video on his phone and pics of it and i witnessed the event from watching his video and looking at his pics. he says that he was standing outside in the daytime (early afternoon) when suddenly he noticed a beam of light in the sky moving at high rates of speed. he became suspicious when the craft began to make quick loops and it appeared to be doing tricks in the sky. it would move abruptly from side to side and up and down and then in a circular pattern again. suddenly on the video the craft disappears into thin air. he says that the beam resurfaced approximately 400-500 feet in the sky and began to turn in circles so fast that it appeared to distort the part of the sky that was within the circle it made. he described it to have the same effect of heat rising from the grown and seeing how it slightly distorts the image of the ground. after that the craft disappeared. the second sighting was a row of three ufos that had different color lights moving in formation across the sky at night around 8:30pm. when he took a picture of the ufo it came out to look like a string of different color lights painted across the sky. shortly after the ufo's disappeared. my boyfriend has pictures and video so please contact me as soon as possible!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Beam of white light in the sky traveling at a speed so fast in a circle it appears to distort sky

content.detailedDescription: At about 0830 pm, i was driving east on interstate 10 between biloxi, ms. and pascagoula, ms. i noticed an unusual row of lights ahead, low in the sky, and north of the interstate highway. since i am a helicopter pilot, i found these lights peculiar for any operating aircraft to exhibit. these lights did not move and i quickly gained on them. arriving abeam the lights, i clearly observed a dark shaped triangle, darker than the night sky. the object appeared stationary, approximately 400 feet of altitude, and less than a mile north of the highway. due to traffic congestion, my attention was divided and therefore i was unable to fully scrutinize this object. perplexed by what i had just seen, i drove on and subsequently lost sight of it. hindsight, i wish i had found a place to pull over for further observation.
content.summary: Black triangle hovering 1/2 north of interstate 10

content.detailedDescription: It was aprox 11 pm at night and i was laying in bed looking out my bedroom window at the woods. i saw what i first thought was the moon..Until i watched it desend to the ground ..About 20 to 30 min later there were little flashing lights everywhere..In the field with my horses around my house and in the woods ..Like the were looking for something ..I was terrified but extremely fasinated and curious at the same time ..So i began taking pictures ..First from my bedroom window ..Then i went outside..They knew i was out there and seemed to be scared of me..They didnt move once i was outside..Not long after..I herd tree braches breaking and i witnessed their aircraft take off out of the woods..Its lights were bright blue and flashing ..It hovered for a moment then gone in a flash ...I have a picture...I told a few family members and friends about my experience ..They thought i was crazy ..Then i showed them pictures ..Can you guys please help ..I am sending some pictures ...But i have many more...This happened aprox 8 weeks ago...I havent felt right since...Please help!!...You may contact me anytime  via  phone  or email....Thank you for your time.
content.shape: Cone,   Circle,   Cylinder,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Unknown
content.summary: Witnessed flashing lights ..Witnessed take off of craft ..Witnessed alien activity ...Have many pictures .

content.detailedDescription: I was at a bar, a night on november 2012, and it was 23:20 (i recall the time with such precision because right after i saw it a friend of mine received a text on her mobile). there was thick fog; as i was speaking with my friend, i caught a light with the corner of my eye. i instinctively watched the sky over my head, and saw a glowing disk, of a yellow-greenish colour, flying over my head. i believe it was flying at an height of about seventy to three hundred metres and it had to be of five to 50 metres in diameter. the sighting lasted a little longer than a couple of second, and the object disappeared behind a house
content.summary: A huge glowing disc flying over my head and disappear behind a house

content.detailedDescription:
I had just gone to bed and i had left the curtains open, and the sky had started to darken with the night but was completely clear without clouds.

i looked out of the window as i lay in bed and saw a very bright pulsating object approaching my view, at first i thought it was an aeroplane as it had red and white lights, but as it got nearer i realised this was something very different.

as the object approached me, quite slowly and silently, from experience i recall looking out of a aeroplane window into clouds where lightening is flashing below you, this transparent object seemed to contain this actual lightening event within itself, really beautiful and bright but as it passed above me there was a cluster of very deep red lights in a circle below it which did not flash.I could see that it almost looked transparent but could see their was a so called skin to it, all smooth,but like hexagonal sections,which all seemed to contain the wonderful light show.

i was amazed and stunned, like the saying goes,like a rabbit caught in the headlights of a car.The object turned slightly in its path before disappearing behind other buildings in the distance.

consequently on the day before, the sameday and day after we had groups of military helicopters flying over our area, these were military as they carried missiles on the side,which is unusual around here and on the 12th september 2013 a large jet aeroplane flew across very low in the evening with a large radar dish on the roof of the jet, another peculiar site for this area.
content.summary: Transparent pulsating red/white egg

content.detailedDescription:
My name is nick rosenberg, i'm 23 years old, and this is somethig that i need to get off of my chest.. it still haunts me and i just need people to know about it. a few years ago i was living at my grandpas house in the hills of clearlake california. he worked out of town and was only at the house a few times a month, so i was fairly secluded. lake county is, for the most part, a very rural area. my house was on the top of a hill near the highway, but still very quiet.. 
now, i've always had trouble sleeping and i had actually gotten to bed at a reasonable hour that night, but i woke up around 4am feeling restless. i wasnt surprised at this behavior, it happened often around the time, so i stepped outside to get some fresh air. i had been hearing strange things outside around my house that week so decided to grab my flashlight. i mean hearing strange things i mean like footsteps and almost guttural noises, growls and low grunts.. i thought it was maybe a deer? a bobcat? a cougar? whatever. i wanted to scare it away, or at least just see what it was.. but to my surprise that night when i shined my light out at where the noise was coming from, i saw glowing eyes and something stood up. tall, at least it seemed to me. it was about 3ft taller than the grass around it, which was probably about 4ft tall itself.. it seemed mad and i was so scared that i couldnt even scream. i wanted to and tried because i had family that lived nearby, i thought maybe they could see what i was seeing, or maybe i could scare this.. thing, away from me. but i couldnt get myself to make a noise, like something was blocking me. i tried hard to yell as loud as i could, nothing came out. and then i remember getting a very good look at this thing.. its skin was brownish, light brown splotched with dark brown with kind of a grey shade to it. it seemed to have holes in its body on its shoulder, arms, neck, chest... it had a humanoid frame ridges on its arms legs chest and head.. its head was larger than normal, and so were its eyes, almost almond shaped, but still kind of rounded. the skin seemed like sharks skin, texture wise, or like what elephant skin without all the wrinkles would look.. 
after i had tried to scream i found myself stuck staring at its eyes, frozen in fear, standing on my deck in my boxers(thats actually an important detail) and its eyes went from pitch black to having kind of human eyes. a round pupil and cornea, except it turned amber, vibrant amber and spurred up like a flame.. then i blacked out. i remember feeling myself being moved like i weighed nothing, as if i was a child. i rememer some dialogue even, but thats a different story. 
i woke up the next morning with no immediate recollection of what happened, found it strange that i was on the top of my covers, fully clothed, and facing the wrong way on my bed.. i told myself this was only a dream until i started thinking about it more.. things don't add up. they still don't. someone please help me make sense of this..
content.summary: I wish it was just a strange dream..

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling south on patten tract road in sandusky ohio erie county, about 7:28pm. this road is next to nasa's plum brook station. i first saw what i thought was a hot air balloon or a high flying kite. then i realized it was moving towards me to fast to be either one of them. i was driving alone in my van with my eye glasses on. i could see very well as there were no clouds in the sky and the sun had not yet set. i followed the object with my eyes as it came closer to me. my mind went from what am i seeing to wow. thats not a normal flying object. it was following the road i was on going north. i was going south. the road was straight for miles. my viewing of this object from begining to end was about 20 seconds long. as the object came close enough for me to make out details of it i could see it was about 300 to 500 feet in the air, it was moving swiftly with no sound noted. it was rectangular in shape but the front of the object was octangular with a round yellow ball of light protruding from beneath the octangular section. the overall color of the flying object was copper with gold lines in the shape of a x on the rectangular section of the object. gold lines made a octagon shape around the yellow plasma like ball. as it passed over me, i looked in my rear view mirror to see it. but did not see it. i continued to drive south for about 20 seconds looking back out my rear window. thinking i would see it. but did not. so i turned around and drove about 2 or 3 mile back to see if i could find it again. but did not. i then relized i was the only car on this road at this time. i then sent a friend a text of my event and drove home wondering if i had just saw a space ship or something not of this earth. i was not a believer of ufo's before this. now i am 100% sure of them now.
content.summary: Copper rectangular coffin shape body with octagon shaped front. yellow glowing orb protruding from front octagon section.Moved silent at low level.

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside to smoke a cigarette and noticed a bright red light to the west. it looked to be a few blocks away and a few hundred feet in the air. looked like a 'flying' road flare, same type glow.

it started to gain altitude as it moved to the west. as it was moving away from me a second one appeared about a minute later in approximately the same place that i had noticed the first one. it also slowly ascended and moved westward. there was a good deal of separation/distance between the two.

both slowly 'floated' away and then faded from sight after about five minutes. first one vanished from sight about two minutes ahead of the second.

first thought this may be a prank of some kind, possibly someone tying road flares onto helium balloons. years ago some friends and i filled up a garbage bag with helium and watched it slowly float up and away until we lost sight of it.

this would have been bad timing for a prank though. it was just after midnight on a week night and the flight path took the 'lights' over about a mile of residential housing and then open country. chances slim and none that anyone would see them.

checked the wind speed on the weather underground after coming back in. it said '0'.
content.summary: Looked like road flares tied to helium balloons

content.detailedDescription:
i was on my deck with my telescope to observe the andromeda galaxy. i also had my binoculars to help with a quick location. after briefly scanning the ene skies near cassiopeia and finding andromeda i proceeded to pick a lens for my scope. looking up briefly before looking though the viewfinder, i saw a chevron shaped object flying very, very fast to the east. the object was perhaps 1-1.5 inches wide at arms length. when i first saw it the object was at approximately 25-30 degrees. it flew in a straight line with no altitude change. the object was light pink/red with an almost transparent, watery aura appearance. i observed it for 3-5 seconds, then it faded from view. the object was below the clouds which were fairly light and wispy at the time of my observation. the color of the object remained unchanged throughout the observation. the color and faint light and strange appearance of the object seemed to emote from the object. it was not a reflection from anything as far as i can tell. 
  when i first noticed the object i thought it could be a bird, however that notion was quickly dispelled by the appearance and incredible speed. this all took place at approximately 10:00 pm cdt. my initial reaction was puzzlement, then slight exhilaration. i don't know what i saw but i have never seen anything like it before.
content.summary: Chevron shaped object traveling at extremely high rate of speed was observed for approx. 5 seconds heading due east.

content.detailedDescription: I walked out of my friends house when i saw an egg shaped object in the sky. at first i thought it was a cloud, but it was too low and no other clouds in the sky. then ii was thinking that it was a puff of exhaust smoke from a disel engine or something, but it did not fluctuate or dissipate with time. it was perfectly still. the object appeared to be over the top of the water pumping station for the area. then my friend walked out of her house and i said to her "look, is that weird since there is no othjer clouds in the sky?" as we both looked away from the object - to look at the sky all around us. then it was just gone, there for 5 to 7 minutes grayish in color and then gone
content.summary: Looked like an cloud but sharp edge and no fluctuation to shape.

content.detailedDescription: Was walking next door to pick up our dog when i looked up in front of us there was a bright light and it was very big and bright at that time i told my girlfriend to go and get my camera she returned with it and the object did not move much so i started to take some pictures and tried to record it but the camera was having problems.So i told my girlfriend to keep an eye on it untill i returned with my video camera,tri-pod,and started to film as i was filming i was also taking pictures with the video camera while also using binoculars which made it a little closer i saw very bright white lights looked to be around 5 to 6 circular shape.I filmed for about 17 minutes it looked like it got closer and then move away untill it eventually went over the tree line and i couldn't see it anymore...
content.summary: Looked like a big star but was too low to be a star

content.detailedDescription: This is the second night in a row i filmed this hoovering light from my 23 floor balcony. i've seen lights like this filmed before and realise it could be an incoming plane on a flight plan with atmospheric conditions...In fact the only sightings i've ever had in the past few years have been on flight plans near airports, not just in a busy city but in the wilderness. this light phenomenon is morphing.I was drawn to it and asan abductee i take this feeling seriously.
content.summary: On a flightpath to toronto harbour airport with plane

content.detailedDescription: My friends and i were in our complex hot tub on saturday night september 7th 2012, close to 10 pm having a party.  we were talking and having a great time, when suddenly we noticed a very bright light to the north of us over an adjacent condo complex.  it had two large round green lights, and two red lights of equal size on the bottom, which did not flash and were much too large to be from a traditional aircraft.  it rose up from behind the adjacent building and came towards us.  it then hovered silently for a few moments, rotated or spun in place and then moved off towards the north east where it could no longer be viewed behind the building.  all six of us that witnessed it felt that there was no doubt in our minds that we were seeing something extraordinary and were completely dumbfounded by the incident.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hovering disc with 4 large lights sighted over carlsbad, ca

content.detailedDescription: I have seen these things intermittently all year.  this evening i was letting my dog out via our backdoor for a potty.  i always look up to see the stars.  when i first started seeing this, i had no idea what it was. i felt a little scared.  over time, though, i just want to know exactly what it is.   i have seen the same object at the same time for the past 3 nights.  there is another object in the sky in a southeasterly direction this evening.  last night the planes changed their flight patterns to seemingly avoid this object i saw in the sky.  originally they were flying in a diagonal pattern over our house from the ne.  then i noticed that they started arcing around to the north to continue their flight to indianapolis international seemingly trying to avoid this object.  all the times that i have seen it, and most recently with binoculars that pick up ambient light, i still cannot make out a definite shape.  i don't hear any sound.  i don't smell anything odd.  there is one thing that i noticed this evening.  there was a distinct white flash that i saw through my binoculars.  if it turns out to be nothing, that's fine.  i just want the satisfaction of knowing what it is.  i don't have a camera that is good enough to take pictures of the object.  i wish i did.
content.summary: 2-3; ne and se, not in formation; planes seemed to arc their pattern to avoid ne object
